type.name: T:Elysium.Controls.Window
type.summary: A base class for "Metro" style windows.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Window.IsMainWindow
property.summary: Gets or sets the value, which corresponds to whether specified window is main. Application can have only one main window.
property.value: True, if the window is main, False otherwise.
property.remarks:
Identifier field
Metadata
This property can be applied to any class-successor of System.Windows.Window.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Window.GetIsMainWindow(System.Windows.Window)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: A value, which corresponds to whether the specified window is main.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Window.SetIsMainWindow(System.Windows.Window,System.Boolean)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
A value which corresponds to whether the specified window is main.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Window.Progress
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates a percentage of task completing by the window.
property.value: The value that indicates a percentage of task completing by the window. Default value — 0d.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Window.OnProgressChanged(System.Double,System.Double)
method.summary: Called when the dependency property changes .
method.param: An old value of the dependency property .
A new value of the dependency property .

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Window.IsBusy
property.summary: Gets or sets the value, that indicates whether the window is in "busy" state at the moment.
property.value: True, if the window is in "busy" state at the moment; False otherwise. Default value = false.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Window.OnIsBusyChanged(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
method.summary: Called when the dependency property changes .
method.param: An old value of the dependency property .
A new value of the dependency property .

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Window.HasDropShadow
property.summary: Gets or sets the value, which corresponds to whether specified window has a shadow.
property.value: True, if the window has a shadow, False otherwise. Default value = false.
property.remarks:
Identifier field
Metadata
The value from system settings is used by default (it is set in default style). While using OS Windows versions before Windows Vista this property is always false.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Window.OnHasDropShadowChanged(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
method.summary: Called when the dependency property changes .
method.param: An old value of the dependency property .
A new value of the dependency property .

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Window.ApplicationBar
property.summary: Gets or sets an application bar for the window.
property.value: An application bar for the window. Default value — null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Window.GetApplicationBar(System.Windows.Window)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: An application bar for the window.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Window.SetApplicationBar(System.Windows.Window,Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
An application bar for the window.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Window.IsApplicationBarHost
property.summary: Gets or sets the value, which corresponds to whether the specified control is a host-object for the application bar.
property.value: Corresponds to whether the specified control is a host-object for the application bar. Default value = false.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Window.GetIsApplicationBarHost(System.Windows.Controls.Decorator)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: Corresponds to whether the specified control is a host-object for the application bar.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Window.SetIsApplicationBarHost(System.Windows.Controls.Decorator,System.Boolean)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified item of the control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
Corresponds to whether the specified control is a host-object for the application bar.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.
